channel.title: Hosting on Ian Carnaghan
channel.description: Recent content in Hosting on Ian Carnaghan

item.title: Tips on How to be a Successful Blogger
item.description: For those that may be unfamiliar with its meaning, the term blog comes from the combination of the words web and log. Blogs can typically consist of entries that include comments on culture, hobbies or everyday life, occasionally featuring a video or music.
